name: cornhole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a game in which people try to throw beanbags (= small cloth bags filled with dried beans or small objects of a similar size) into a hole in a sloping wooden board: People here have played cornhole for years at backyard barbecues and family reunions. Cornhole is such a simple game - it's safe, and everyone can play.
More examplesFewer examplesThe campus offers every activity from marathon running to cornhole.The back of the bar is filled with beer-drinking patrons playing cornhole. Cornhole is a family-friendly game played by two-person teams tossing four bean bags across long distances toward large holes in slanted, raised boards.While many consider cornhole a Cincinnati phenomenon, he says he's seen the game at Philadelphia and Nashville NFL tailgate parties.
